amendment.description: Amendment sought to repeal the bioenergy subsidy programs established in Title IX of the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 115-679 to repeal the bioenergy subsidy programs established in title IX of the 2002 farm bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 340 (Roll no. 197).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Biggs.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Biggs amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 340 (Roll no. 197).
